title: Metekhi
about: Metekhi - a historical district on the left bank of the river Mtkvari on a rocky outcrop in Avlabari, Tbilisi. It was the earliest settlement in the city. According to traditional beliefs, King Vakhtang I Gorgasali built a church (Metekhi Church of the Nativity of the Mother of God) and a fortress here, which also served as the king's residence.
